name: Dodecadone
description:
28 traits, tons of shapes

Press space for a triangle, one of many variety.

That shape might be
  • Bouncy
  • Spinning
  • Racist
  • Protesting gravity
  • Sick
  • Or one of many others...

Your task is to gather them all, make sense of it, and merge your geometric friends and foes to a square. Then, a pentagon, a septagon, a hexagon...

Many others, then... you're dodecadone.


Features

  • Full modding support- anything from new traits to entirely new games!
  • 9 Unique themes, including full transparency
  • Custom themes with CSS
  • Cheats menu
  • Scoring system & speedrunning timer
  • Practically every language ever via automatic translation
  • Silly english for the goofsters
  • 100% free, only with donations. Open-source under CC BY-NC-SA 4.0.
